price: 18. Waxaanse Xaqa ku gannaa baadilka, markaas buu madaxa kala jabiyaa, mise durba wuu baabba’aa. Hoog baadna leedihiin beentaasi aad naga sheegtaan darteed7.
arabic: بَلۡ نَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلۡبَٰطِلِ فَيَدۡمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٞۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡوَيۡلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ
footnotes: 7. waa odhaahdooda baadilka ah in Alle leeyahay xaas iyo ilmo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bal naqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿalā al-bāṭili fayadmaghuhu fa-idhā huwa zāhiqun walakumu al-waylu mimmā taṣifūna
